articles.title: 'When I Saw Virat, DK Bhai and ABD in The Nets, I Just Noticed How....'-Rajat Patidar Reveals His RCB Ritua - News18
articles.description: Rajat Patidar had a stupendous 2022 where he scored a century in IPL in just 49 balls. This was also followed by his Ranji Trophy final century against Mumbai.
